text: to kya jo shakhsh apane paravaradigaar kee taraph se raushan daleel par ho aur usake peechhe hee peechhe unaka ek gavaah ho aur usake qabal moosa kee kitaab (taurait) jo (logon ke lie) peshava aur rahamat thee (usakee tasadeeq karatee ho vah behatar hai ya koee doosara) yahee log sachche eemaan laane vaale aur tamaam phiraqon mein se jo shakhsh bhee usaka inkaar kare to usaka thikaana bas aatish (jahannum) hai to phir tum kaheen usakee taraph se shaq mein na pade rahana, beshak ye quraan tumhaare paravaradigaar kee taraf se barahaq hai magar bahutere log eemaan nahee laate
